greedycraft.tips.text.1: Supremium is a very good material for Tinker's Construct weapons! It's not hard to get if you have ways to grow crops quickly.
greedycraft.tips.text.2: You can throw all ores you get into your tinker's smeltery and see if they form new alloys.
greedycraft.tips.text.3: Press ~ button to mine ores or chop trees quickly! But it also consumes tool durability and hunger fast. Also, you might not be able to do this at the beginning.
greedycraft.tips.text.4: To throw an item, press the / button on your numpad.
greedycraft.tips.text.5: Consider adding a part made with Ardite to your pickaxe, it makes your pickaxe much more durable in practice!
greedycraft.tips.text.6: Use tinker's smeltery to make alloys. It's possible to cast liquids into blocks if you use a basin, which makes converting liquids into ingots much quicker.
greedycraft.tips.text.7: Build your smeltery as big as you can.
greedycraft.tips.text.8: You will no longer worry about getting full inventory when you max out a /dank/null!
greedycraft.tips.text.9: It's said that you can put a backpack into another mod's backpack, and another mod's backpack into another mod's backpack...
greedycraft.tips.text.10: If you are too lazy to build a house, look for villages or search for @Prefab to build one instantly!
greedycraft.tips.text.11: Remember to place a waystone next to the end portal you found, it's very useful.
greedycraft.tips.text.12: If you can't find endermen, you can farm ender pearls with a tiny mob farm!
greedycraft.tips.text.13: A Warp Scroll can teleport you to any waystone at anywhere, but is consumed when used! You can use a warp stone instead, it does not consume but has a cooldown!
greedycraft.tips.text.14: In adventure and casual modes, you don't lose items when dead but loses 75% of your XP!
greedycraft.tips.text.15: Use directional keys to adjust the 3rd person camera.
greedycraft.tips.text.16: You can throw useless tools found in the dungeon into the smeltery!
greedycraft.tips.text.17: If you can't find Blizz, you can pulverize permafrost stones found underground!
greedycraft.tips.text.18: Wires from different mods can usually be interconnected!
greedycraft.tips.text.19: 1st person mode is more used when building or bridging.
greedycraft.tips.text.20: Eat different kinds of food to increase your max health! A multiblock kitchen might make that more easy.
greedycraft.tips.text.21: Building your base in a defiled land is a bad idea.
greedycraft.tips.text.22: Some ores are too rare? Grow them!
greedycraft.tips.text.23: It might be a good idea to keep a cow at home if you want constant milk supply. Also try to squash a cow into a milk jar with an falling anvil!
greedycraft.tips.text.24: Make a grappling hook to explore the world with style!
greedycraft.tips.text.25: Make a XP block to store your XP and never afraid about losing them again!
greedycraft.tips.text.26: Some tinker trait effects are actually negative, but sometimes it's necessary for mining better ores.
greedycraft.tips.text.27: You can craft leather with 4 rotten flesh!
greedycraft.tips.text.28: Lava's heat is not enough to smelt some ores, you need to seek for hotter liquids.
greedycraft.tips.text.29: Vanilla food are nerfed, you should cook better food with a kitchen!
greedycraft.tips.text.30: Don't worry about trampling your farm, farms can't be trampled now!
greedycraft.tips.text.31: Open loot bags quickly with a loot opener!
greedycraft.tips.text.32: Can't find a stuff? Hover over the desired item in JEI and press Y, if it's found in nearby chests you can see a smoke particle!
greedycraft.tips.text.33: Can't find an End City? You can craft an elytra! But it's expensive.
greedycraft.tips.text.34: If you consecutively eat a kind of food it will restore decreasingly lower hunger. Seek for a more variated diet.
greedycraft.tips.text.35: Mobs will occasionally turn into champions and gain a lot of stat boosts, be aware!
greedycraft.tips.text.36: Villagers now look like players and if they are happy you can marry with them?? You probably need a wedding ring.
greedycraft.tips.text.37: A Waystone can be found in every village, don't forget to activate them!
greedycraft.tips.text.38: You will occasionally see battle towers, with a powerful boss guarding the treasure. Be aware!
greedycraft.tips.text.39: You can convert elytra into a bauble to free up your body armor slot!
greedycraft.tips.text.40: View more advanced JEI search methods in JEI settings.
greedycraft.tips.text.41: If you feel laggy, try to use /purge to clear all ground items.
greedycraft.tips.text.42: Ever been to the Lost City dimension yet? For how to build the portal, see the modpack guide book.
greedycraft.tips.text.43: This tip doesn't hint anything, weird!
greedycraft.tips.text.44: Begin your journey to the Aether by building a glowstone frame and pouring water into it!
greedycraft.tips.text.45: The more Ender Dragons and Withers you fight, the stronger they become! But stronger enemies come with greater rewards, too.
greedycraft.tips.text.46: Try fishing! You can fish up many new treasures.
greedycraft.tips.text.47: Difficulty of mobs will increase as you progress!
greedycraft.tips.text.48: Damage calculation of armor points are different from vanilla. Now even leather armors are way better than being naked.
greedycraft.tips.text.49: As the difficulty increase, loot become better too!
greedycraft.tips.text.50: You can open quest menu in your inventory screen, it tells you what to do if you have no clue!
greedycraft.tips.text.51: Difficulty will increase when you defeat vanilla bosses for the first time.
greedycraft.tips.text.52: The lower your hunger is, the slower it gets consumed.
greedycraft.tips.text.53: There are many ways to increase your max health. You can try eating different kinds of food or crafting heart containers.
greedycraft.tips.text.54: Bosses gain less proportion of their health than normal mobs as difficulty increases, and some bosses have a fixed amount of health.
greedycraft.tips.text.55: Search with a @ followed by mod id to search all items registered by that mod.
greedycraft.tips.text.56: Craft two sand blocks into a Snad. It accelerates grow speed of sugarcanes and cactuses.
greedycraft.tips.text.57: You can build a 3*3*3 cube of chance cubes to make it turn into a mega chance cube. BEWARE: GIANT EXPLOSION CAN OCCUR.
greedycraft.tips.text.58: You might get a lot of enchanted items from loot or battle, use them to generate power! There's a dynamo specialization upgrade that can do this.
greedycraft.tips.text.59: Large ore deposits can be rarely found underground, if you find one you will get rich! Notice strange flower circles on the surface.
greedycraft.tips.text.60: Grappling hook can help a lot in the End. Get one before you go there!
greedycraft.tips.text.61: If you have lost the Omnipedia, you can craft one witn an Akashic Tome.
greedycraft.tips.text.62: Dragon metals are among the best tinker's materials and they can gain additional stats by upgrading via fusion crafting!
greedycraft.tips.text.63: Hover over an item and press Shift+del to delete all same kind of items in your inventory!
greedycraft.tips.text.64: If your save file fails to load or you messed up something really bad, restore the latest backup.
greedycraft.tips.text.65: You can craft solar panels for clean and efficient energy.
greedycraft.tips.text.66: Beware of champion mobs! They are very strong and some might pull you with The Force! They also drop some good loot.
greedycraft.tips.text.67: Chances for champion mobs to spawn depends on your difficulty!
greedycraft.tips.text.68: You are more likely to stumble upon large dungeons when far away from the spawn point!
greedycraft.tips.text.69: Right click a pure daisy to directly place blocks around it!
greedycraft.tips.text.70: Not enough building blocks? Use a chisel!
greedycraft.tips.text.71: It might be a good idea to build your base between two biomes because you can easily keep bees that require different biomes.
greedycraft.tips.text.72: §bI just added this tip to see if I can use colored text in tips.
greedycraft.tips.text.73: Infinity block block block can be used as beacon base!
greedycraft.tips.text.74: Search @ftbquests in JEI to look for some items that might help you complete quests!
greedycraft.tips.text.75: Want to sleep at day? build a hammock!
greedycraft.tips.text.76: Shift-click the '+' button in JEI recipe menu to move all items in your inventory to the crafting table.
greedycraft.tips.text.77: You might find tinker's artifacts in dungeons, they can't be modified until you unseal it with a §6Plate of Unsealing§r.
greedycraft.tips.text.78: You can only unlock the final reward by collecting enough medals.
greedycraft.tips.text.79: There is an ultimate quest which requires all other quests to be done. What is the reward? Don't ask me, I'm just a tip.
greedycraft.tips.text.80: Some tinker's materials have deep integration with the mods they come from.
greedycraft.tips.text.81: You haven't got Infinity Block Block Block Block Block Block Block Block Block yet?
greedycraft.tips.text.82: Sometimes quests reward creative shards, which can be further made into some creative mode items, with a bunch of other expensive stuff.
greedycraft.tips.text.83: You can insert §acolor codes§r anywhere to color your texts!
greedycraft.tips.text.84: When you have too many levels of jump boost, jump higher by holding the jump key.
greedycraft.tips.text.85: Mobs sometimes drop loot crate tickets, note that some levels of tickets can only be dropped at a higher difficulty.
greedycraft.tips.text.86: Inventory pets are your good companions, they provide a set of bonus and skills!
greedycraft.tips.text.87: Wires from XNet are better in performance because they aren't tile entities.
greedycraft.tips.text.88: You can start or stop a blood moon with Blood Sigil and Blood Sacrifice.
greedycraft.tips.text.89: You can set spawnpoint at day by clicking a bed.
greedycraft.tips.text.90: When you sleep, if you don't click on 'Set Spawn', spawn point will not be set!
greedycraft.tips.text.91: Not enough ores to use? You can use Mekanism to QUINTUPLE your ores!
greedycraft.tips.text.92: You die when you are killed.
greedycraft.tips.text.93: A boat might be helpful underground to get across the underground lakes.
greedycraft.tips.text.94: Wear your headsets for best game experience.
greedycraft.tips.text.95: Vanilla diamond pickaxe can't mine obsidian and vanilla weapons are nerfed. Please set up your tinker's workshop as soon as possible.
greedycraft.tips.text.97: You can craft dragon breath using a glass bottle and a dragon egg! Dragon egg doesn't get consumed.
greedycraft.tips.text.98: Most ground decorations can be picked up by right clicking! Shift-right-click to pick up its block form.
greedycraft.tips.text.99: Your world will be blessed with new ores when defeating the Ender Dragon!
greedycraft.tips.text.100: Osram can only be found floating on lava oceans in the Nether. Lava Wader and obsidian boat may help you!
greedycraft.tips.text.101: Accessories can have prefixes, which can be changed by reforging. Craft a reforge station to do so.
greedycraft.tips.text.102: Use /purge command to clear dropped items when you experience lag while exploring.
greedycraft.tips.text.103: Mob spawners have a spawn limit and disables itself after spawning a set number of mobs.
greedycraft.tips.text.104: Most rewards of the battle tower require you to defeat its guardian and get the key.
greedycraft.tips.text.105: If you want some challenge, try Expert mode!
greedycraft.tips.text.106: When summoning the Wither, make sure there are no blocks near the structure. Some blocks might make your summon attempt fail.
greedycraft.tips.text.107: Note: Most mobs don't break blocks, but some bosses will, and all vanilla bosses can destroy blocks! Just don't summon a Wither at home.
greedycraft.tips.text.108: The Shady Merchant gives some tempting deals... but are they genuine?
greedycraft.tips.text.109: You can crush most of dungeon loot into time shards, which can be used to summon even more loot.
greedycraft.tips.text.110: Most tools and armors that don't belong to tinker's construct have been disabled. Try to find out the best combo of tinker's materials.
greedycraft.tips.text.111: You can make tinker's tools basically out of everything... Many more materials are added TiC integration in this modpack.
greedycraft.tips.text.112: Cosmilite is an extremely strong material, but also almost every other strong alloys combined.
greedycraft.tips.text.113: Some mobs only appear in hardmode!
greedycraft.tips.text.114: Mob spawners disable themselves after producing a set amount of mobs!
greedycraft.tips.text.115: Use /syncdifficulty command if your difficulty goes wrong.
greedycraft.tips.text.116: If you are bothered by warp, try to craft a §dPurifying Pill§r. It clears all warp on you.
greedycraft.tips.text.117: If your magnet on you keeps sucking items when you need them for crafting, try to craft a demagnetizer which disables this effect.
greedycraft.tips.text.118: You can simply jump over the fences, but mobs can't!
greedycraft.tips.text.119: If you find a lot of mud underground, you can find Cytosinite nearby.
greedycraft.tips.text.120: Do not care too much about enchanting. Tinker's tools don't need enchantments.
greedycraft.tips.text.121: Mystical crops grown in the typical way don't drop seeds. Use a organic infuser to grow crops!
greedycraft.tips.text.122: You can pass leaves, but leaves also slow you down.
greedycraft.tips.text.123: The chance for a meteor to spawn increases after you go to the nether once. The chance also increases greatly in a star shower.
greedycraft.tips.text.124: If you stay at a place for a long time, the chance for a meteor to spawn will get halved, if you stay for longer, it gets halved again.
greedycraft.tips.text.125: Occasionally at night, a star will fall from the sky, go after it and you can pick up a fallen star.
greedycraft.tips.text.126: You are 1.5 blocks tall when sneaking, which is just enough to pass a 3-slabs-tall hole.
greedycraft.tips.text.127: You can throw ingots or ores to the ground to instantly unify them according to their ore dictionary.
greedycraft.tips.text.128: When advanced tooltip (F3+H) is enabled, the ore dictionaris of an item will be listed in the tooltip with gold color.
greedycraft.tips.text.129: When getting hit by a spider you might gain increasingly high level of slowness. If you are already slow enough it can trap you with a cobweb!
greedycraft.tips.text.130: It's possible to find a giant tinker's smeltery in a village!
greedycraft.tips.text.131: Ever been to the depths of the ocean? That's where the Aqualite can be found.
greedycraft.tips.text.133: When you fall into the void you will be sent into the Nether!
greedycraft.tips.text.134: Warning: don't play with thaumcraft at home. You have been warned.
greedycraft.tips.text.135: Got a bunch of dungeon loot but don't find them useful? Just crush them to time shards!
greedycraft.tips.text.136: Got a bunch of dungeon loot? You can generate power with them!
greedycraft.tips.text.137: Tip: don't play this game with a default skin.
greedycraft.tips.text.138: Use sharpening kits and polishing kits to repair your tools and armors.
greedycraft.tips.text.140: You can find urns that contain treasures! Beware of snakes!
greedycraft.tips.text.141: Aim for the mob's head when shooting. Headshots deal more damage!
greedycraft.tips.text.142: If the background music stops playing for too long, press alt + minus on numpad to reload Ambient mod.
greedycraft.tips.text.143: You can put all kinds of strange rocks into a Solid Centrifuge and see what you get!
